name: Devils Deserters
description:
You are playing Death, sent down to earth by the beast himself in order to dispose of the Devils Deserters. See how many you can kill before the hordes of skeletons becomes too much, even for Death himself.... 

Movement: WASD 

aim: mouse 

attack: Mousebutton 

Pause game: double tap ESC

For feedback, support, or other enquires contact: info@alpsentertainment.com
